name: Harvest Escape: Acres of Doom
description:
Description:

Harvesting machinery has gone sentient, gone on a mad reaping spree through your crops, devouring your crops to fuel their senseless rampage! You must escape your farm, but first, you should find your little menagerie of animals and keep them safe!

Harvest Escape is a high-tension puzzle game. Evil harvesters are threatening most squares on a grid, and you must find safe spots for the farmer within a limited time. Once time is up, watch as the engines of doom wreck havock on your fields and hopefully don't feed on you and your expanding crew. Survive 5 levels and a farm animal will join your group, adding more tension to each level. Keep the whole group alive until you've found all 6 animals and escape these hellish fields!

How to Play:

Mouse: Hold left click to drag and drop characters in safe spots
Esc - Quit to Menu, Quit Game
